Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.view.gui.controllers

Class ServerSetUpController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.view.gui.controllers.GuiController
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.view.gui.controllers.ServerSetUpController
public class ServerSetUpController extends GuiController
Controller class for the server setup screen in the GUI. Handles user inputs for server IP, port, and connection type, and attempts to connect to the server.

    • ServerSetUpController

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init()
      Initializes the server setup screen. If server configuration is already provided in the client configuration, it uses that to connect to the server. It also sets up listeners for input validation and updates connector type based on user selection.
      Overrides:
      init in class GuiController

    • handleConnectButton

      private void handleConnectButton()
      Attempts to connect to the server using the provided IP address, port, and connector type. Validates the IP address and port before attempting the connection. Throws a RuntimeException if a RemoteException occurs during the connection attempt.

    • attemptConnection

      private void attemptConnection()
      Attempts to connect to the server using the provided IP address, port, and connector type. Disables the connect button while attempting the connection. If a RemoteException occurs, shows an error popup.

    • disableConnectButton

      private void disableConnectButton()
      Disables the connect button to prevent multiple connection attempts.

    • enableConnectButton

      private void enableConnectButton()
      Enables the connect button after a connection attempt.

    • handleRMIButton

      private void handleRMIButton()
      Handles the RMI button click event.

    • handleSocketButton

      private void handleSocketButton()
      Handles the Socket button click event.
